title: WARRIOR NUN AREALA (1994-2000) and 2006 reboot one-shot
description:
Long before "Machete" and Lindsay Lohan's nun with a gun...
This one's for Mothra67.
These were remarkably hard to find, as unfortunately so many books that once were easy to get (via Dem on oid) are becoming...

------

This torrent includes: 

Warrior Nun Areala 01-03 (1994-95) miniseries
Warrior Nun Areala - Rituals 01-06 (1995-96) "Book Two" miniseries
Warrior Nun Areala - Scorpio Rose 01-04 (1996-97) miniseries
^^^written by Steve Englehart
The Crimson Nun (1997) 01-02, 04 (1997) miniseries
^^^thanks to blackcanary, but unfortunately missing #3
Warrior Nun Frenzy 01-02 (1998) miniseries
^^^fully painted by Esad Ribic
Warrior Nun Areala - Resurrection 01-03 (1998-1999) miniseries

And the odds & ends:

Warrior Nun Areala - Bolt Premium 01 (1997)
^^^some sort of weird incentive comic for retailers who ordered trading cards, from Avatar Press!
Warrior Nun Lazarus #0 (2006) reboot attempt that flopped

Plus a bunch of "bad girls" crossovers with Avengelyne, Glory, Poizon and Razor... I'm not even going to list them but they're in here.

------

Please seed and share!  --STF
